Room.Name: Northeast Courtyard/Franchot Tunnel Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: This is the northeast side of the courtyard, at the Franchot Tunnel opening.
Room.LongDescription: The lower class members of the fighting forces are restricted from this area, and only castle's troop commanders and knights are allowed to be here. The tunnel leads into the interior of the castle, and to the quarters of one of Prince Rutger's most loyal friends, Franchot the paladin.
